tc_name: pp73 - fully repayment without origination fee one day after grace period ends
Validations:
payment_amt_cents should be full principal amount.
current_principal_cents should be loan amount - repayment amount + late fee + interest amount
total_balance_cents should be  loan amount - repayment amount  + late fee + interest amount
total_paid_to_date_cents should be payment amount

tc_name: pp74 - half repayment without origination fee one day after grace period ends
Validations:
payment_amt_cents should be half of principal amount.
current_principal_cents should be loan amount - repayment amount  + late fee + interest amount
total_balance_cents should be  loan amount - repayment amount  + late fee + interest amount
total_paid_to_date_cents should be payment amount

tc_name: pp75 - 5 % repayment without origination fee one day after grace period ends
Validations:
payment_amt_cents should be 5% of principal amount.
current_principal_cents should be loan amount - repayment amount  + late fee + interest amount
total_balance_cents should be  loan amount - repayment amount  + late fee + interest amount
total_paid_to_date_cents should be payment amount

tc_name: pp79 - fully repayment with origination fee one day after grace period ends
Validations:
payment_amt_cents should be full principal amount + origination amount
current_principal_cents should be loan amount - repayment amount+origination fee  + late fee + interest amount
total_balance_cents should be  loan amount - repayment amount+origination fee  + late fee + interest amount
total_paid_to_date_cents should be payment amount

tc_name: pp80 - half repayment with origination fee one day after grace period ends
Validations:
payment_amt_cents should be half of principal amount + origination amount.
current_principal_cents should be loan amount - repayment amount+origination fee  + late fee + interest amount
total_balance_cents should be  loan amount - repayment amount+origination fee + monthly fee
total_paid_to_date_cents should be payment amount

tc_name: pp81 - 5 % repayment with origination fee one day after grace period ends
Validations:
payment_amt_cents should be 5% of principal amount + origination amount.
current_principal_cents should be loan amount -repayment amount+origination fee  + late fee + interest amount
total_balance_cents should be  loan amount - repayment amount+origination fee  + late fee
total_paid_to_date_cents should be payment amount
